column4: correct me if I'm wrong ... but in the old days wasn't there only usenet..... or usenet-ish things....
in The Old Days there was no Usenet because only DARPA funded sites had access to DARPAnet :)
alive, maybe. but far from well. there are precious few gopherholes.
but they do exist. some people are really dedicated
so it's been quite a while since I looked around for gopher sites
there are cases where apt-get is a better choice than aptitude (e.g. dist-upgrades to new releases)
well.. that's for dist upgrading from xubuntu dapper to xubuntu edgy
be honest now... did you write that?
i have been bored in my life. never *THAT* bored.
